p: Compared to those for CA16 and other enteroviruses, the EV71-positive rates were significantly higher in severe cases (χ 2 = 4591.13, p < 0.001) and fatal cases (χ 2 = 706.89, p < 0.001) each year, whereas they were lower in mild cases (χ 2 = 5282.46, p < 0.05). Thus, EV71 appears to be the dominant pathogen causing severe and fatal HFMD from 2010–2015.
